com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Interface DatabaseCopyOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseCopyOperationsImpl

    public interface DatabaseCopyOperations
    Represents the SQL Database Management API includes operations for managing SQL Server database copies for a subscription.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      • create

        DatabaseCopyCreateResponse create(java.lang.String serverName,
                                  java.lang.String databaseName,
                                  DatabaseCopyCreateParameters parameters)
                           throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                  org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                  javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                                  java.io.IOException,
                                  ServiceException
        Starts a SQL Server database copy.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the SQL Server where the source database resides.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the source database.
        parameters - Required. The additional parameters for the create database copy operation.
        Returns:
        Represents a response to the create request.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was an error configuring the parser for the response body.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the response body.
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - Thrown if there was an error creating the DOM transformer.
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.

      • delete

        OperationResponse delete(java.lang.String serverName,
                         java.lang.String databaseName,
                         java.lang.String databaseCopyName)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         ServiceException
        Stops a SQL Server database copy.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the source or destination SQL Server instance.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the database.
        databaseCopyName - Required. The unique identifier for the database copy to stop.
        Returns:
        A standard service response including an HTTP status code and request ID.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
